Description:
Full Sized Home on Compact Block in Kennington
Idyllic' only begins to describe the location of this quality home. Towards the end of a quiet residential court and almost adjoining a recreational walkway to Mill Street, this home (along with its neighbours) knows the true meaning of house-proud street appeal.
Deceptively spacious, inside you will find three bedrooms with robes, and a generously proportioned bathroom space. The open plan living/meals area opens to the kitchen, which will cater for a family with ease. Ample bench space and cupboards, gas cooktop and a dishwasher complete the picture.
The home is serviced by ducted gas heating and ducted electric cooling, which is particularly useful on those hot and sticky summer days.
While the elevated block is a low maintenance 311m2, the landscaping is thoughtful and useful. Pedestrian access from the front yard on one side of the house, and from the single garage on the other, there is a small well-kept garden shed, tiered retaining garden beds and a grassy area that would be ample for small pets, young children or those who prefer low-maintenance gardening.
If you would like to walk, the All Seasons Resort on McIvor Road is less than 1km away, or if you head the other direction you'll find Kennington Reservoir, Woolworths, IGA, Aldi, and numerous specialty stores within walking distance.
The appeal of this home is truly universal. Perfect for retirees who are looking for high-quality, low-maintenance living, ideal for first home buyers or those looking to secure property in this sought-after suburb at an affordable price point, and appealing to investors who know there will be many tenants seeking a property like this.

Description:
CONTEMPORARY, PRIVATE & AFFORDABLE
A very tastefully updated home in a superb Kennington locale being very handy to Kennington Village, Kennington Reservoir and only 1.5ks to the CBD. This lovely property is ready for new owners and there really is nothing to do.
It is a contemporary weatherboard home from the 60's and boasts beautiful polished Baltic Pine floors and big windows. On entry is the lounge - typical of its era with a feature mantel; there's an adjacent meals space with room for a larger table. The kitchen is superb and features 900mm stainless cooker with gas top and electric oven; there's a dishwasher, pantry, wide fridge space and views to the alfresco area.
The three bedrooms have built-in robes, new carpet and ceiling fans, all are a good size; the bathroom is modern and trendy with a tiled floor, shower over the bath, vanity and storage behind three mirrored cabinets and a toilet; the laundry has a benched area and room for a dryer; and there is a second toilet off the laundry. LED Lighting, there's a brand new new Split System air conditioner in the main bedroom and a second air conditioner in the meals/living space; ducted gas heating through the floor and painting is all recent throughout.
Outside is a private outdoor alfresco space out back which takes up the bulk of the rear yard and there's an enclosed front yard with a grassed area and shrubs on the fence line. There is a double carport out front with easy access to Clarence Ave.
Very appealing, very easy-care allotment (329m2) and a great position - inspect and you will appreciate this little gem.

Description:

This classic Californian bungalow located on a prime Kennington corner lot is a fine example of why the style is currently fashionable with it's flexible floor plan and characteristic details.

The original owner and builder was a plasterer who added some of the finest decorative ceilings and deepest cornices available along with timber fretwork to the hallway.
Still in excellent condition, the home boasts space-adding high ceilings and wide hallways along with three big bedrooms, central bathroom and spacious gas-heated lounge with supplementary split system air conditioner.
Large eat-in kitchen, upgraded some years ago, includes gas cooktop, electric wall oven and ample cabinetry with a separate laundry and toilet off the rear vestibule.
The corner lot provides easy access to a carport off Clarke Street and two original stone stables in the backyard. One has been converted to a studio/worksop (power/lights) while the second could be used as another shed or outdoor living area.
Extras include 6 solar panels, rainwater tank, garden shed and pretty gardens.
Ideally situated within a short walk to the city, university, schools, shops and public transport.
Perfect as is, but with loads of potential for future improvement, this is a must-see.
